Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black (partly worn) below; trace of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; below, two white bands; exterior, from top: billet band at rim; broken maeander frieze; painted decoration consisting of sphinx (head with hair and possible trace of curlicue remaining) to left.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0426) (phase 2)
